templates.name: Happy shopping - All brands
templates.content: Happy Shopping!

templates.name: Escalating after business hours - All brands
templates.content: Thanks! Let me check on this for you. It's a little late so it's likely I won't hear back by today, though rest assured I'll reach out once business hours resume.

templates.name: Sorry - All brands
templates.content: I'm sorry!

templates.name: Thank you for your support - All brands
templates.content: Thank you for your support, we appreciate you!

templates.name: Price Matching
templates.content: I'll be happy to check on this with my team! Can you please send me a screenshot or the link of the item you want us to price match?

templates.name: How does Klarna work? - All brands
templates.content: Klarna is the easiest and safest way to get what you want today, and pay over time. Read more about it in detail here: https://www.klarna.com/us/what-is-klarna/

templates.name: Do you see anything you like - All brands
templates.content: Do you see anything you like in particular or would you like me to make a recommendation?

templates.name: Sign up the customer for restock - All brands
templates.content: Would you like me to sign you up for our restock notifications? Can I have your email address?

templates.name: Order number and email - All brands
templates.content: Can you please send your order number and your email address? I'll check on this with my team and get back to you as soon as I have more info.

templates.name: Cost of Duty - All brands
templates.content: The cost of duty isn't charged by us, and is specific to your country! I suggest hopping on google and finding a duty calculator, those are pretty accurate.

templates.name: How do I remove items from my cart? - All brands
templates.content: To remove an item from your cart, return to our home page, and click on the cart button in the top right corner. You should be able to edit your order from there. Here's the link to our website {companySiteLink}

templates.name: No promotions available - All brands
templates.content: I'm sorry, I don't have any codes available at the moment, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out! In the meantime, you can check out our sales collection here:

templates.name: Color is not the same - All brands
templates.content: The actual product color may vary from the images shown. Every display has a different color range, and every individual may see these colors differently. In addition, lighting conditions at the time the photo was taken can also affect an image's color.

templates.name: Angry customer - All brands
templates.content: I totally understand where you're coming from and what you're feeling right now is absolutely valid. I can assure you that our team is doing its best to handle the situation in the best way possible.

templates.name: Can I use two discounts? - All brands
templates.content: You actually won't be able to use multiple deals at checkout but feel free to use the one that has better value for you.

templates.name: I haven't received my order yet - All brands
templates.content: Let me look into that for you! When did you place your order? You might still be within our production time frame.

templates.name: I can get better shipping with Amazon, can you match them? - All brands
templates.content: I'm afraid it's really hard for a small business to compete with Amazon and their free shipping. They get much better rates based on their volume and are a massive company by comparison.

templates.name: Follow up 1
templates.content: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team and

templates.name: Why does the company name show up in your messages? - All brands
templates.content: Our texting system includes our brand name so that you always know who's texting you, even if you haven't saved the number yet.

templates.name: Pregnancy - All brands
templates.content: Congratulations on your pregnancy! I wish you all the best during this special time.

templates.name: What APP is this? - All brands
templates.content: Glad you like it! We use a couple of pieces of technology to create this experience for our customers! Check it out here: https://www.attentivemobile.com/

templates.name: Sent wrong text - All brands
templates.content: Oh, please disregard the last text. It was sent by mistake. Sorry about that!

templates.name: I bought it from Amazon (returns)
templates.content: Thanks for letting me know! Since the order was placed through Amazon, you'll need to contact them directly to begin the return process, they handle all returns on their end.

templates.name: Items in cart - All brands
templates.content: Can you please send me a screenshot of the items in your cart?

templates.name: Feel free to reach out - All brands
templates.content: Feel free to reach out to me if any questions come up, I'll be more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Before the conversation closer 2 - All brands
templates.content: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?

templates.name: How do I exit shop pay/ How do I see your financing options? - All brands
templates.content: You will have to exit out of ShopPay where you are, first. Click on the cart icon on our website, fill in your contact information, click on next, select your shipping method, click on next, and then you'll see the available payment methods. Let me know if that doesn't work for you!

templates.name: Inappropriate content - All brands
templates.content: Due to the content of your previous message, I am unable to continue with this conversation. I will be closing this chat now.

templates.name: Package en route - All brands
templates.content: I checked and your package is still en route to your shipping address. You may track it here:

templates.name: When shipping timeframes do not work out for a customer - All brands
templates.content: I'll definitely appreciate it if you can consider us in the future when we have more time to get you your order though!

templates.name: Screenshot - All brands
templates.content: Thanks for the screenshot!

templates.name: Code won't work - All brands
templates.content: Sorry to hear that, I just tested the code and it worked on my end! Make sure you enter it in the promo box at checkout and click apply. Let me know if you're getting a specific error message.

templates.name: No response from customer support 2
templates.content: So sorry for the delay! We are dealing with an influx of support messages but this does not make your concern any less important. The team is working as hard as possible to address each issue promptly and as soon as I hear back I will message you immediately. I know my apologies won't help in this situation but rest assured, I understand how frustrating this can be and I'm very sorry I can't provide you with an immediate solution. I'm thankful for your patience and understanding and as soon as I get word about this, I will contact you!

templates.name: Tracking Info - All brands
templates.content: You'll receive tracking info via email as soon as it ships. Please check your spam and promo folders as sometimes our emails end up there.

templates.name: Customer tells us we are scamming them
templates.content: I'm sorry for any inconvenience this has caused. I want to reassure you that our brand is not a scam, and it is never our intention to mislead or cause frustration. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us, and we take concerns like this very seriously. Mind telling me a bit more about what happened? I'd be happy to look into it.

templates.name: New Arrivals
templates.content: In the meantime, feel free to take a look at our new arrivals here:

templates.name: My (person/pet) passed away/died - All brands
templates.content: On behalf of the team, I'm truly sorry for your loss and wish you and your family my deepest condolences as you grieve through this.

templates.name: Feedback 2 - All brands
templates.content: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. We want to make sure we keep our loyal customers happy with our products and I will definitely pass this on to my team to consider in the future. Thank you again, and please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with today.

templates.name: Is the site secure? - All brands
templates.content: Our site is secure and safe! Your credit card information is encrypted during transmission using secure socket layer (SSL) technology, which is widely used on the Internet for processing payments. Your information is encrypted and not visible to us or anyone else, and your credit card information is only used to complete the requested transaction.

templates.name: Are you a concierge/Attentive representative? - All brands
templates.content: I'm part of the customer service team, let me know how I can help today, happy to assist you.

templates.name: Send me a link - All brands
templates.content: Do you mind sending me a link to that product so I can make sure we're on the same page?

templates.name: While I wait for the team - All brands
templates.content: While waiting for my team's response, is there anything else I can help you with?

templates.name: Where do I add the discount? - All brands
templates.content: You'll find the discount box at checkout. If you're on a desktop you'll see it at the right side of your screen when you enter your shipping details. If you're using a phone, you'll need to enter your info and shipping method, and then expand the "Order Details" at the top of the order section in order to reveal the discount code box! Let me know if you can't find it.

templates.name: Too many texts
templates.content: I'm truly sorry for the inconvenience. I'm unable to limit the number of texts we send out, as we do our best to keep everyone informed about the latest news and promos. However, if you'd prefer not to receive any more messages from us, just let me know and I'll be glad to coordinate this for you!

templates.name: Pre-purchase escalations - All brands
templates.content: Good question! I will have to double-check that with my team to be sure. As soon as I hear back, I will send you a message right away!

templates.name: Timeframe - All brands
templates.content: This is the only timeframe I can provide and I'm afraid I also can't guarantee it because of the possibility, however slight, that the courier might run into unforeseen delays in transit.

templates.name: Feedback - All brands
templates.content: Thanks for your feedback, I'll definitely pass it along to my team for it to be considered in the future!

templates.name: Bad reviews - All brands
templates.content: I understand the hesitation after seeing a bad review, but I can assure you we watch all reviews closely and do our best to remedy those issues. We'll work hard to make sure you're happy with your purchase.

templates.name: Site won't work - All brands
templates.content: First, I might suggest trying to open the site in an incognito or private window, to rule out any browser cache or extension issues. Let me know how that goes.

templates.name: Code brings shipping below threshold - All Brands
templates.content: After applying the code, it might have brought your total to an amount lower than XX which would explain why you were being charged for shipping. If this is the case, feel free to add anything else to your order to reach the minimum for free shipping again! Hope this helps!

templates.name: Trying to use a gift card - All brands
templates.content: If you have a site-specific gift card, you can enter it at checkout in the box that says, "gift card" to the right of where you enter your shipping info. If you're referring to a prepaid card, our site will accept some and reject others, so if you put it into the site, and it rejects it, you won't be able to use that as your form of payment.

templates.name: Which item - All brands
templates.content: Can you please tell me which item are you looking at? I'll be more than happy to check on this for you!

templates.name: Code brings shipping below threshold 2 - All Brands
templates.content: I just checked and it looks like the code brought your subtotal below our shipping threshold. Would you like to add anything else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Hope this helps - All brands
templates.content: Hope this helps!

templates.content: Awesome! Hereâ€™s a code for you to use: {coupon} {lastViewedProductLink}

templates.content: Affirm lets you pay overtime with no hidden fees, read more about it in detail here: https://www.affirm.com/how-it-works

templates.name: Feedback 1 - All brands
templates.content: Feedback from our customers is really valuable for us and helps us constantly improve! I'll definitely pass this along to the team to consider in the future and thank you for the feedback!

templates.name: Customer says NO THANKS, just browsing, not right now etc - All Brands
templates.content: No worries! Feel free to reach out if there's anything I can help with, and in the meantime, check out our best sellers here:

templates.content: Afterpay lets you pay overtime in 4 easy installments, read about it in detail here: https://www.afterpay.com/how-it-works

templates.content: Thank you for sharing the photo with me!

templates.content: That's great! Thank you for shopping with us and I hope you enjoy your new purchase. Feel free to reach out anytime if you have questions!

templates.name: Awesome, thank you for your purchase!
templates.content: Awesome, thank you for your purchase!

templates.name: My pleasure! - All brands
templates.content: My pleasure!

templates.name: I emailed! (after being sent to CS) - All brands
templates.content: Perfect! Someone from the team will get back to you in no time, hang tight.

templates.name: Have a great day! - ALL BRANDS
templates.content: You're welcome! Have a great day and if you have any questions, feel free to shoot me a text.

templates.content: So sorry about that, can I have your order number and email, please?

templates.name: Slow reply - All brands
templates.content: Sorry for the slow reply!

templates.name: When does the promo end? - All brands
templates.content: I don't have the exact info as to when the specific promo ends but I suggest you take advantage of it as soon as you can so you don't miss the deal!

templates.name: Customer replies with 2+ numbers/letters for Concierge journeys (PLEASE EDIT PART THAT SAYS NUMBER/LETTER ACCORDINGLY DEPENDING ON THE JOURNEY) - All brands
templates.content: Thanks! Our system provides you with personalized exclusive content automatically. And if you don't mind, please respond with a single NUMBER/LETTER to get sent the details you need!

templates.name: Personal information - All brands
templates.content: I'm flattered but I'm afraid that due to strict company policy, I'm unable to give out any personal info, hope you understand! Though I'll be happy to chat about our products if you need any help.

templates.name: Are you a bot?
templates.content: I'm definitely a live person, we don't rely on bots when it comes to providing excellent service. Let me know if there's anything I can help you with.

templates.name: When did you email - All brands
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! Can you please tell me when did you email us?

templates.name: Too many emails - All brands
templates.content: I'm truly sorry for the inconvenience! I can't limit the number of emails we send out because we do what we can to keep everyone looped in about the latest news and promos, though if you prefer not to get any more emails from us, you can simply open any recent one you received, scroll down and hit the 'unsubscribe' button. If you'd also like to have your number removed from our system, please let me know and I'll be glad to coordinate this for you!

templates.name: Sales Page
templates.content: In the meantime, feel free to take a look at our sales page here:

templates.name: The Site Won't take my Card - All brands
templates.content: Make sure your billing information zip and the zip on your credit card match. I also suggest trying a different internet browser, as certain ones have issues with ecommerce stores. Is there an error message you're seeing on your end?

templates.name: Customer wasn't approved for financing - All brands
templates.content: My apologies, we use a separate company for financing and not everyone qualifies for it! The terms of financing and approvals are set by our partners and I'm afraid I have no additional information on this on my end. I suggest reaching out to them directly for more details.

templates.name: Discount error 2 - All brands
templates.content: Sorry about that! Any specific error you're getting? Mind sending me a screenshot?

templates.name: Invalid code for marketing texts - All brands
templates.content: Just to be sure, have you already signed up for marketing alerts via text or email before? Because if you have, our system is actually set up to offer the same promotion you were already provided which might be why that discount code isn't working!

templates.name: Shipping too expensive - All brands
templates.content: Our shipping costs are what we get charged to ship to you, so the cost is calculated by the shipper from our location relative to yours. Enjoy if you decide to go for it, and let me know if anything comes up!

templates.name: Overall cost ( you need to add a discount code) - All brands
templates.content: I'm sorry about that. If it helps with the overall cost, you can use

templates.name: What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?
templates.content: I'm so sorry about this. If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!

templates.name: I can't redeem my points/there's no option to do it at checkout - All brands
templates.content: If you're using express checkout you won't be able to redeem your points. You'll need to click on the cart icon on our website, fill in your contact information, click on next, and at checkout you'll see the option to redeem your points. Let me know how that goes!

templates.name: Ask away - All brands
templates.content: I would be more than happy to help out, ask away!

templates.name: Purchase at your convenient time - All brands
templates.content: You can make your purchase at your most convenient time. Let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with today, happy to help!

templates.name: Of course - All brands
templates.content: Of course, anytime!

templates.name: No expedited shipping - All Brands
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't have any expedited shipping options available at this time, sorry about that!

templates.name: No response from customer support - All brands
templates.content: I totally understand the frustration with this! Our team handles emails in the order they come in and sending additional ones will further delay the team's response. Rest assured that one of my colleagues will follow up with you in no time!

templates.name: I'm feeling suicidal / I want to end my life - All brands
templates.content: I totally understand the mounting pressure fighting our personal battles puts us under, and the effect this has in all areas of our lives! I myself have found that talking things out can definitely help and I urge you to call this lifeline right away that provides 24/7, free, and confidential support: 1-800-273-8255

templates.name: Pre purchase support - All brands
templates.content: I'm afraid my system isn't set up to help you solve this issue - please get in touch with our customer support team, as they're much more equipped to help you with this.

templates.name: Only paypal available, customer wants to use a card - All brands
templates.content: You can still pay using your card by choosing PayPal then click on complete order.  Once redirected to the PayPal login page choose the option that says pay with a card  and you should be able to pay using your credit card even without a PayPal account

templates.name: Label created but there's no movement
templates.content: "Label Created" means that a shipping label has been generated by us, but the package has not yet been scanned or picked up by the carrier. The package might still be waiting for pickup or may have already been dropped off but not yet scanned. Please give it a few more days, and if there's still no update, feel free to check back in. I'm happy to help!

templates.name: Bestsellers
templates.content: In the meantime, feel free to take a look at our bestsellers here:

templates.name: Weekend Escalations - All brands
templates.content: Let me pass this on to my team! Since it is the weekend, they might not get back to me until Monday but I'll be in touch as soon as I get an update.

templates.name: Restock (notifications)
templates.content: I'm sorry, I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page so you're notified the second it comes back in! In the meantime, what do you think about this instead?

templates.name: Wrong name
templates.content: I apologize for the misunderstanding. Can you please share your name and your phone number? I'd be happy to notify my team of this and help get this resolved!

templates.name: Damaged/broken/missing item - All brands
templates.content: Can you please send me a photo of the item/s that you received along with your order number and email address?

templates.name: Let me know - All brands
templates.content: Let me know how that goes!

templates.name: Proud - All brands
templates.content: My pleasure! We're actually quite proud of how we're able to engage with our customers like this! Have a wonderful day and if you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

templates.name: Sorry, can you clarify that for me please? - All brands
templates.content: Sorry, can you clarify that for me please?

templates.name: Guarantee delivery dates - All brands
templates.content: Unfortunately, I can't guarantee delivery dates, I can only give you an estimate in business days.

templates.name: Prepaid card rejected - All brands
templates.content: Sorry about that! Our site will accept some and reject others, so if you put it into the site and it rejects it, you won't be able to use that as your form of payment. Do you have a credit card you can use?

templates.name: Signed up for restock - All brands
templates.content: Alright, you're all set! We'll notify you via email once they're back in stock

templates.name: Hope you'll go for it - All brands
templates.content: Hope you'll decide to go for it!

templates.name: Will my cart expire? - All brands
templates.content: Products will remain in your cart until the cookies are cleared by your browser. The time frame will vary, but the cookies are set to automatically clear within a month. Your abandoned cart link will not expire before then, unless the product you are looking at runs out of stock.

templates.name: Check spam - All brands
templates.content: Please check your spam and promo folders as sometimes our emails end up there.

templates.name: Follow up - Email 3
templates.content: Thanks for your patience on this! I just heard back from the team and it looks like we're already in touch with you via email/phone. You can just respond from there. You're in excellent hands!

templates.name: Waiting for the team - All brands
templates.content: I'm still waiting to hear back from the team though rest assured I'll shoot you a text as soon as I have an update!

templates.name: Pre-purchase escalations - All brands
templates.content: I'll be more than happy to check on this with my team for you. I'll reach out the moment I have an update.

templates.name: You're welcome! - All brands
templates.content: You're welcome!

templates.name: Already have discount but not working - All brands
templates.content: I don't have any info on that code but there could be some requirements included with it. Interested to know where you got it? Think you can send me a screenshot? I'll be more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Customer confirms they have a pending charge and no email (edit accordingly) - All brands
templates.content: If you didn't get an email confirmation, then it's possible that the order didn't go through. If the charge on your account is pending, the order has not gone through and should either be refunded within 24-48 hours or processed successfully. If the charge reverts, you can place the order again. If the order processes, you'll get a confirmation email soon.

templates.name: I understand - All brands
templates.content: I completely understand and I'm really sorry you had to go through this.

I'm afraid we don't carry that item at the moment but I'll definitely pass this along to the team to consider again in the future, thank you for the feedback! If you have any more questions, feel free to let me know. For now, what do you think about this instead? -

templates.name: Follow up - Email 1
templates.content: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team and one of my colleagues will reach out to you and will be assisting you directly from here on out. You'll be in excellent hands!

templates.name: How does Sezzle work? - All brands
templates.content: Sezzle lets you Split your entire order into 4 interest-free payments over 6 weeks. No fees if you pay on time with zero impact to your credit. Read more about it here: https://sezzle.com/how-it-works

templates.name: Did I order already? - All brands
templates.content: Can you please also check if you received a confirmation email or a charge on your account? Be sure to check your spam and promo folders for the email as well.

templates.name: PC/Laptop - All brands
templates.content: So sorry about that. If you're on your phone can you please try from your PC/laptop instead?

templates.name: How does Splitit work? - All brands
templates.content: Splitit lets you pay over time using your existing credit card, without interest or credit checks. You can learn more here: https://support.splitit.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020789519-How-does-Splitit-work

templates.name: Can I use 2 different cards at checkout? (send ONLY if E-gift cards are offered) - All brands
templates.content: Unfortunately, you won't be able to split your payments at checkout but here's a little secret - you can purchase an E-gift card so it can be emailed to you. Then use that balance towards your purchase, and use the other form of payment you had in mind. It's the easiest fix!

templates.name: Restock (website & social)
templates.content: I'm sorry, I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend checking our website and social media frequently. In the meantime, what do you think about this instead?

templates.name: No processing time available
templates.content: Just a heads up, after you place the order, it will then go through a stringent order-processing stage (preparing, packaging, etc), so we can make sure they're safe in transit and that can take a maximum of 3 business days. Once it's handed over to the courier, that's when your chosen shipping method takes effect.

templates.name: Let me check on that for you - All brands
templates.content: Great question! Let me look into that for you. Hang tight!

templates.name: Already purchased - All brands
templates.content: Awesome, thank you for your purchase, I hope you'll love it! Have a great day and if anything comes up, I'm here.

templates.name: Customer spread the word - All brands
templates.content: That's wonderful to hear! Your steadfast support is one thing; spreading the good word is quite another. Thank you very much!

templates.name: [Auto-responses] Goodbye Message
templates.content: No problem. Feel free to reach out anytime, I'm always here to help!

templates.name: Why do you retain my credit card info when I pay with ShopPay? - All brands
templates.content: We don't retain the card info of our customers. Shop Pay is owned by Shopify and if you opt in on Shop Pay, your card details will get saved. You can opt out of Shop Pay at anytime by going to: shop.app/opt-out

templates.name: Will financing affect my credit score? - All brands
templates.content: It's possible. Once you have taken out a loan or payments by installment, the financing company may report repayment information about your account to the consumer reporting agencies, which may impact your credit score. Ultimately, it would be best to check on this directly with the financing company, as certain policies may vary.

templates.name: Can't take calls - All brands

templates.content: Anything else I can help you with while I still have you?

templates.name: How did you get my phone number - All brands
templates.content: I texted you because you subscribed to receive personalized marketing messages from our brand. If you didn't mean to sign up for this, let me know and I can unsubscribe you from our text message marketing list. Otherwise, I'm happy to help you with any questions you have today!

templates.name: How soon will I get a response from customer support - All brands
templates.content: Our team is doing everything to respond to each inquiry in a timely manner. They should follow up with you in no time!

templates.name: Thank you for your support - All brands

templates.content: Happy birthday! I hope this is the beginning of your greatest, most wonderful year ever!

templates.name: Apologies for the inconvenience - All brands
templates.content: My sincere apologies for the inconvenience!

templates.name: I love your company - All brands
templates.content: I'm so happy to hear that! Thank you for your support, it means the world to us!

templates.name: Products too expensive - All brands
templates.content: Thanks for your feedback, I'll share future deals that may interest you since we'd love to change your mind! If you have any questions just reach out and I'd love to help!

templates.name: My item has been with UPS / USPS/ FedEx for a while now, it's not moving - All brands
templates.content: Since it's already with the courier, the best way to handle this is to contact them directly. Did you try calling them? They should have more info.

templates.name: Sorry 2 - All brands
templates.content: I'm sorry about that!

templates.name: Where is my order? - All brands
templates.content: Can you please tell me when you placed your order and whether you received tracking information? I recommend checking your spam and promo folders since our emails sometimes end up there.

templates.name: Thank you - All brands
templates.content: Thank you. Have a great day and if you have any questions, feel free to shoot me a text!

templates.name: Automatic discount - All brands
templates.content: I just checked and it seems like what you're looking to purchase already has a discount pre-applied which is why the code isn't working as the system typically can't stack more than one promo at checkout.

templates.name: Have a great evening - All brands
templates.content: My pleasure! Have a great evening, and always feel free to get back in touch if any questions come up.

templates.name: Get well - All brands
templates.content: I hope you'll feel better soon! I'm sending positive vibes your way for a speedy recovery!

templates.name: Screenshot 2 - All brands
templates.content: Can you please send me a screenshot of what you're seeing on your end? I'll be more than happy to look into this for you!
